reviews: New
I still little bit confused with this object and how to play the game. Is the life just only 3? And the lifes will automatically fill up for another minute?
Not sure
Well it can be addictive, but the pics don't really match what they ask for! Kettle is NOT a flower vase!! Saxophone is a horn!! Fix it big time
Fun and cool graphics!
it's a fun game yet not that easy at the start but thanks to the very helpful hints. I enjoy the game now with its cool and colorful graphics.
I love hidden object

ever since I was a little girl I have always loved to do the hidden object games. playing this one has made me remember how sweet it was to have no worries and have fun as a child. I recommend this game to anyone who just wants to sit back and enjoy remembering an easier time
Amazingly addictive
Great game! I am learning more and more tricks as I go. The only issue I have encountered is I am running out of boards ;-)
Love it.
Works great and so much fun. Awesome time killer with out being boring and repetitive.
Addictive
Its really good to kill time. If you love Candy Crush But hate it at the same time, you'll love this game! Dont believe me, you'll see.
Juice Cube

Don't have anything else too give me good to move on.  If u are stuck for so long their should be a way to proceed.  It says if you get so many hearts you can get gold I am not I like playing the game. But if I can't go any further its worthless to have started it in the first place.help me move on. .....
No more Pay to play! Thanks!
Thanks so much for adding the map piece raffle! Now it gives players a way to continue playing the gamw.
Fun Bullcrap! :-)

Level 45 is rigged!! It's freakin impossible. And they only give you about 8 gold bars  throughout the whole freakin game even though you need gold bars to freakin do anything!! Other than that it's great fun!
Won't load

The game hasn't loaded for 2 days now. It was fine at first but now I'm having issues with it. I think there was an update recently so that must be the problem. I got this game to take a break from crushing candy but I'm gonna have to uninstall it.
Seriously?

So playing this game is awesome.  But when you have  to Spend money just to get past the 35th level  I'm done.  Oh you can bug your Facebook friends too but who wants to do that?  And after 3, 8 hour searches (that's 21 hours) for 3 maps,  I've found a whopping 1. So yes I'm out, it was fun while it lasted. To the Devs I ask "what's the point of the full screen ads in between each level of at one point you're going to make it impossible to continue? I'd much rather pay for unrestricted access to the game"
Can't get past 40 even if friends unlock
Good idea but friends have unlocked and can't get further forward. .. keeps going back to needing 3 keys so uninstalling. On level 382 on cansy crush without spending cash so no thanks...
I played. .got to 40 asked for help, got one, then git 2 and ...

I played. .got to 40 asked for help, got one, then git 2 and then all disappeared. Login to Facebook, got coins, unlocked, couldn't pass the level before running out of lives and took me back and locked the gate again.
Forever can't connect to Facebook
I have a stable connection either when using 4G or Wi-Fi but I'll never manage to link to the progress on my Facebook. Nothing wrong with FB app settings.
Big No
Was enjoying game but it doesn't let you go far if you don't link it to fb. So I am removing app.Shouldn't have to have facebook to play a game
Forced Update. Grr.

If all the games I have, only this  one has forced an update. And it's a blind update: no idea if the update will negatively impact the game (eg., force close or lose progress). If I had wanted to update this game, I'd've chosen to do so already.
Whats happen?

At first i thought it was a great game, untill i get to level 40... I already pay 70coins to pass the gate, unfortnately when i got out and try to play again, im shocked that im still at level 40 and the most shocking is all my coin is gone!!... So my question is "What happen?". Can the person that in chare in creating this game give me a good and reasonable answer?
Galaxy  S3

I totally love this game!!! Having trouble with my players pics showing, not used to seeing usernames but after the problem they just fixed for me I can live with this one until they get this issue fixed! Words is my link to the outside world! Must have
ads are getting ridiculous

I know more then a few people who hardly play this game anymore... because of the ads. 1. there is always an ad on the bottom of the screen 2. after every move there is another ad 3. all these ads burn up data... my data usage (for this app) has more then doubled in last 2 months... same amount of playing, just more ads and higher data requirements  I am not paying to lose the ads, I will simply switch to an app that doesn't suffer from this problem... easy choice.
Pauly
Latest update claims faster load time. Well that's another lie. Fix what you say your gonna fix. Update department must be run by the Obama administration.
Still like this game
I wish it would slow down w/always wanting me to buy more i have "paid" version but they keep wanting more
Keeps freezing
This game used to load quick but since the last update most of the time I get WWF has stopped working & freezes my phone. Please fix this issue so i can give it the 5 star it previously had
Play daily
All that needs to change is the chance that the app can leak my private information!
I like it!
Definitely different than many of the popular games out there right now

My daughter & I love it
Great Game
Challenging and fun.

Great game
Awesome

Veery fine
Good puzzles
If u dont want the adverts turn your wifi and data off when u play, simples. This game just boils my blood tho. Pretty boring and very repetitive
Nicely done.
Works great on Gal S3.  Simple, elegant, varying levels of challenge.  Nice job.
I love this game. Addictive!! Its math made fun!!
Updates, PLEASE!!!!
Great game.
I really enjoy playing because it something different and besides that its fun and educational at the same time.
Not that good
There keeps being ads after 1 game of playing it is so boring I would advise you not to get it it doesn't  work probably not happy.
Ads! And Loss of Progress
All progress is wiped every ten or so minutes it seems. And every couple of levels popup ads come up. Too many.
What is up with the gameplay? The one click style is limiting no matter ...
What is up with the gameplay? The one click style is limiting no matter how "helpful." Take that off and let me take the reigns and I'll reinstall the app.
Ads Lots of them
Download only if you want ads for vacuum cleaners. Nothing like the original. Total crap
Liking less and less

I have always liked this game.  And at first this version performed reasonably well.  But now it takes so long to get to the game with all the ads and things.... there is no time to play the game IF YOU CAN GET IT TO OPEN.  I think I am just going to uninstall it.
Works fine on Google Nexus 7

I love Tetris. It's been a staple of the gaming industry for as long as I can remember, and this version has really good touch controls. Only thing I can think to make it better would be online multiplayer, or at the very least, a weekly online tournament similar to Angry Birds Friends. Either way, great game.
Different but fun
The app is a bit confusing in the way you select where and what orientation you want to put the pieces in. But it's creative and easy to get used to
Addictive
I'm loving this game so much been having trouble putting it down. My only thing is the setup is a little confusing with all the games and options. But at least it's got variety
stay away
stay away from this guys apps, he just steals other peoples and bundles ad's over top of them .
Big problems
This games biggest problem is the ads as the pop up randomly and would catch you off guard. A nothing problem is that its a less fun version of lazor
Need a 0 rating
Will not download
Crap
Lod of crap dunt work big proploms
Aggressive Ads

The puzzle game is fun.  Only issue is when I'm into it and ready to play the next puzzle an ad will pop up at random and I'll have my finger ready to start the puzzle, but nope...it's an ad and I've clicked it by accident and now I have to go through the hassle of going back into the game.  I would suggest a banner ad system instead.  I have installed after playing a grand total of 5 minutes, it's all I could take of the random full screen ads that would take me out of the game causing lose of emergence.
Copy of original
I hate unoriginal games like this.. this. Is a complete rip off lazors!!!.. UTTER RUBISH!!!!
Won't load

It keeps saying it needs 4M and that there is insufficient space, although I have over 800 megabytes free on both my phone and SD card, its like the beta test all over again and it keeps freezing, I'm uninstalling all your games from my phone cause they all do the same stuff
Where is my daily login reward?
I had started tis game few days agi and been playing everyday but I can't get daily login reward. T.T
Cannot Install
This game won't install! :-[ It keeps saying it can't install in default location. ??? I have a Samsung Galaxy SII by Boost Mobile. Can you explain why this is happening? Or do I have to ask Google?
Lag plz help

Listen to me I got a dark knight last night then spent 10 dollars to get another I did I was happy go to evolve and one of them are gone it happens to me yesterday a lil I would like if you would gimme my dark knight if u can check u will see I earned 2 so plz give it back
Awesome game

This game is good minus the few freezes and I have to force close losing my progress. And for those with the daily event. It doesn't skip. It gives you the card and starts the whole process over again saving another day of log in which helps you. I was confused at first but now I understand.
Very polished

Looking for a random game to fall victim in addiction to, this one grabbed me.  I've played many like it.  But usually get lost in all the menus and events.  This one is very polished and easy to learn.  Keep up the good work gamevil your games are slowly consuming more and more of my extracurricular activity time
But...
Great game but...once in a while a "free" boost appears after you use it one game it charges you for it and no way to cancel since you used it already and its in your boosts.
Grrr
Every since updated I can never get matches on the free spin!!  Also would like more features like from desktop plz. Then ill give it 5stars
Works great but no party mode.

I really like this app! It's much faster than my laptop, and I can use two thumbs rather than a mouse. But, I'm disappointed that I can't access party mode. If they would fix that, I would change my rating to 5 stars.
Plenty of fun, needs minor tweaks

This is certainly more fun than most apps that work on my phone, but I'd like to see a couple changes. First, whenever a hint appears, there is no need for it to go away until the player makes a move. Second, there needs to be some sort of confirmation dialogue any time coins are spent. Literally every coin I've spent ever was by mistake.
Spam

This is a great app except that you cannot turn off push notifications. Therefore, there is no way to stop this app from constantly spamming your phone with unwanted notifications even when you're not playing the game. So, instead of enjoying this app, I have to uninstall it.
Meh

A cheap little cash grab. No real depth like the other bejewelled games had with different modes, and stats. This is just a game to kill time while on the can. Deleting your highscore once a week is just an artifical way for prolonging game play.
No dragon game request please

Ever since I rated you with a five, I have this play dragon game request come up every time I play another puzzle. I don't mind your flashy little advertisements at the bottom but I don't like the complete interuption. So now I rate a 1.
Surprised
Downloaded to advance in another game but soon became addicted to this game.   Would have given 5 stars if it would somehow disable mt screen blackout.
Can't turn off notification
Even though I have turned them off in the settings, they still keep coming.  Not worth keeping if a game is going to wake me up.  Uninstalling.
Good game!!!
Love the word search but it could use more words... all the level puzzles have the same words so its no challenge for me after the first one... other than that good game n great time passer
Good

I enjoy the puzzles and supply of variations but is it just me or do others have a hard time earning more than one star? I didn't notice any rules or exclusive ways to earn rewards so I assume timing is everything. I have completed all puzzles played (about 15) in less than two minutes and never seem to earn more than one star. I realize this is a small complaint to have but I finished one in 35 seconds and got only 75% of a full star...sigh.
Simply amazing
Like every other cross word except ir's amazing. I love it! Im usually not the crossword type of person but this will definitely wake you up in the morning and and once you play it, you can't stop!
RIP OFF!!!

While I like the game, I paid for the extra levels and there were more levels coming soon. They still aren't here, yet there is a where's my water2. Should give us what we paid for before releasing a new game. Will not be buying anything related to these games again.
Fun, but..... keys...

Love the game, but hate the idea of having to buy keys or bug my friends on Facebook. How many more times would I need to buy keys in the future too?? Or is this a one time deal? I'd like to know how many times I'll be investing in this if Disney has the game fully functioning already.
Original was better.

While I still enjoy the gameplay, it seems like I spend more time between levels going from screen to screen and clicking next or ok, than I actually spend playing the game. Same gameplay as original, now with more garbage filler & spam. I think I'll go play through the original again.
New version not an improvement

I LOVE all the others... Where's my Water, Perry, Mickey...  the game play on this is good too, but you have to pay extra for keys to advance OR spam your Facebook friends begging for them. I have bought the other games, and I would buy a full version of this too if I knew that buying the "keychain" would be the only purchase necessary. Also, the music turns on EVERY time you start the game, which is extremely annoying.
Mystery Duck bug
Road block is still there! And no mystery duck challenges anymore :(
Great game destroyed.
Its very cheap to charge huge amount of money to buy 3 keys to unlock beach level. Never expected this from d Disney.
Love at first block

Great game, fun for a couple minutes or a couple hours. People with giant stubby fingers (like a certain reviewer) might have trouble Xing out the ads that pop up every 5 levels or so, but people with ham hands will have trouble with anything on a touchscreen. Bottom line: Get a stylus and download this great game anyway!
Great game

Favourite game. Pop up ads only about every ten games, not annoying. The ones that half cover the bottom buttons were annoying and made it hard to go back but haven't seen them for a while. At first I managed to use a couple of hints accidentally but upgrade gave me five new ones :)
Advertisements

The advertisements in this app are used in the most forceful, obnoxious ways I've ever seen. While playing, a dialog  will come up and no matter where you click on the screen it redirects you to the Google Play Store. Upon this ridiculous advertisement scheme I uninstalled at once.
love game
but ads are HUGE annoyance. Would be awesome if the ads closed properly tho. Please fix
Great thinker quickie game
Minute to learn, easy to understand, quick levels, all ages, easy on ads, and not so engrossing that you can't turn it off at a moments notice.

Interesting and flawed.

Some of the answers to the puzzles are a REAL stretch and don't really make sense. In that case, I just use the letters to form a word. I can't give this game more than 3 stars due to its flaws. Number 59: Really?? That was a horrible way to represent the word! If you're going to have ads after every other level at least provide a way to earn FREE coins.
Great game
I love it . I down loaded it today im on  #175 and only had to have help twice but once i knew the answer i realized it made since and how every thing connected. Great game i highly recomend it.
Okay

awesome cool
awesome now i have all 3 cut the rope cut the rope experiments and cut the rope time travel.

Can't stop playing. love to play on my Acer Tablet

Kinda but not really
Kinda like the original bubble bobble but not quite there. My touch sreen is just fine but the bubble kept shooting off in other directions. And no aiming help for beginners?
This game is not as fun as bubble shoot. This one doesn't let you ...
This game is not as fun as bubble shoot. This one doesn't let you switch balls, and the aim is not accurate. Try bubble shoot and you'll see...
Boringgggggg.
Seriously i got to lvl 28 in like 10 minutes.... haha. This game blows.... bubble shooter is more challenging than this horse $hit.

Not worth the time to download. You cant switch between balls to use strategy nor is the aiming accurate. You touch to shoot but it does not go where you want it to.
This game

This game is fun, but it will not give you the colors you need on certain levels. Some levels are super easy and some are ridiculously hard. Only gave 3 stars because some of the levels I get to take sometimes a week to beat. Fun game, but some levels are impossible without losing until the set of colors comes in that will work. 7 browns in a row is not helpful.
Shoot bubble.deluxe
I soooooooo lovethis game its so addictive I never even rate apps bt I had to post something def a five star game and for free.u cant beat it everyone should try it:)
Quickly Becomes a Grind

The difficulty jump between islands 4/5 is pretty big.  The jump between islands 5/6 is even worse.  Your crew size limit is 3.  Even with a team consisting of varying Elements and your Aid in battle, you can maximally have a team of 4 of the 5 elements.  That remaining element becomes dead weight.  This doesn't matter so much in the beginning of the game, but as you progress, it becomes a very difficult factor to overcome.  And there's no way to get new characters without buying magic stones; endless grind
Great, Challenging, Fun
Besides all the bugs here and there, great game so far. I would love to see this game grow. Please work hard to fix these issues. I can't evolve after one time.
Why do enemies attack after killing them

I like the game, love the pokemon/puzzle gameplay style. The one thing I really don't care for is that enemies still attack even after you killed them. Kinda irritating especially when its a strong enemy.
Oh yeah real fun
Would be nice if i could actually play the datn thing keeps saying package invalid.
Decent but a small problem

I gotta say its a fun game to waste time on but there's a problem I saw every time I lvl up my monsters it says ill get about so and so experience but when I hit merge the exp lowers I've noticed this thruout game play so I guess it must be on purpose nothing less im going to uninstall it sorry
Looks great
But never made it past the extremely long boring tedious frustrating unnecessary tutorial. .. uninstalling the game is more fun and tons faster.
Lee shuman wtf

I think Lee doesnt know what the definition of free means so he should shut the fuck up oh waaaaaaaaaah there's ads, how else are they gonna make  moeny if there's people like you Lee so just be grateful fucking sick of People like you. In conclusion game was aite but srs lee rethink your shit, including others.
Fun, but frustrating

I enjoy the game a lot, but sometimes the it freezes and my only option is to kill the app. The ad placement is equally as annoying. Full page pop ups every few levels gets in the way of the game flow, especially when they only partially load and don't give an option to go back to the game.
Red green color blind

Can't play it :(.  Used colors that are too similar for a red green color deficient person.  For example don't use neon green and neon yellow on the same board. I can't see green well so yellow is exactly the same color.  Other colors, If used, I can't see are red and purple or blue and purple depending on the boldness of each color. Stopped at level 3 because of the color. Use a bolder green if using yellow etc etc. Thx.
Black outs

Was a fun game and made it to level 3 when the game would randomly go black. Would start pushing buttons and then it would come back on in the options screen. By level 5 I got sick of the black outs. Am now uninstalling. Could be a neat game for those who can get it to work right.
"Free"
If a game is made free by a company, then there should not be advertising.   Otherwise, it is a good puzzle game.
Galaxy 4
To avoid the ads. You should put your phone on airplane mode. I know it's a hassle because there's no internet. But you can play ad free.  This game is the best game I've downloaded.
Caused S3 to crash
My S3 had never been forced to restart until I played this game. It's laggy and unresponsive too. Pity, because the game was fun for a few minutes.
I only played the LITE version...

And I am thoroughly impressed. The physics are solid and intuitive. The controls are a bit inaccurate, but that's to be expected on a small touch screen device (nexus s). Speaking of which, it runs well on my old device!
Good concept
It's a pretty good game but got error on each level which froze the phone.
Pretty good fun

You can make some truly mad contraptions with this app. Enjoyed the demo levels in the Lite version and then played around in Sandbox mode. The only criticism I have is that the control mechanism can be a bit fiddly, but this is more likely to be down to the device that the actual app. Now, if it could support the hardware controls on the Xperia Play then it'd be a real winner!! Tested on Sony Ericsson Xperia Play and worked perfectly.
Love it
Very cool and time consuming game!
Great idea, but...

Moving and positioning objects vs. swiping the screen is insanely frustrating, object connectors are hard to place, and "physics" are not intuitive (I.e. one would think that a piece of wood could not pass through a big metal object jutting out from a wall)
Pretty good
Not too bad but I cant pass on a puzzle if I cant figure it out. Only other option seems to be purchasing coins. Not good enough to put money into.
Love

I I love games is cool awesome and the best games ever please don t give up you like your this gameand help you out like to tell you what to do next and when you are done whath the next one u have a lot to do I LOVE THIS GAME IT COOL!!!!!!!,!!??????
Great game!
New to game, but so far I like it.  Only problem I think, is having to wait to go to the next level.
Super Fun
Its super fun something to do when I'm bored and I usually hate apps but this one is great
A little easy
But at least its not too difficult like others
Love the game; however, had to uninstall it and re add it because my level 34 wouldnt open after I had already completed 94% of it. Ughhh

Tried many different ways and watched a lot of videos on it but it is too hard... Zcom always wins because the virus doesn't make it to a specific waterlocked island or something.  Should make at least normal beatable in my opinion.
Fun but limited

I like that you can unlock the majority of the features_ and even the pay to play have something unique to offer. But I don't think one should have to get the full version to speed up the game as the last remaining humans die off.
DID YOU JUST SNEEZE ON ME?
Don't conquer the world, just destroy it! Love the game. Hours and hours of fun.
Awesome game
This is by far one of the best strategy games on Google Play. Even the casual mode can be tricky on certain plague types. Definitely has great replay value in my opinion.
This game
Its a great game that makes you think. There is only one problem that i see is that it is lagging, and once it starts lagging it kicks me off. If that was fixed i will give it the full five stars.
VERY FUN GAME
This game is well made and feels very real as if this could happen in real life. Its quite scary actually.
3 stars

Duh

Can't even download!
Tried 6 times and always get an error code! If I could actually get the game then I will give a rating.
Started out ok...

The game was interesting and I wanted to see more but after emerging from the engine rooms an add popped up asking me to buy hints and answers. I didn't need any so I clicked the 'no thanks' button. It brought meback to the menu screen. It won't allow me to go further without buying unnecessary hints. If the game is fee, it should be free. If you want to be paid, say so at the beginning. I would have paid then but not now.

I think its a little hard cause there is no instruction but also fun and irritating because you want to figure out how to do it but you can't at first so it thrilling and fun when you learn what to do
Just started this game....so far so good!
Not thru to much of the game yet but I am enjoying out so far!

IT'S FUN THERE'S A LOT OF EASY ONES YOU GO RIGHT THROUGH THE WORDS. IT'S A FUN GAME JUST TO PAY THE TIME AWAY OR IF BORED.

I beat it in 3 days no new levels so do I just wait pretty addictive but I wanna play more
One clue

Awesome! Giving the one letter really helps without making it too easy. Have tried a lot of similar games and this is the best by far.
Give 0 if could

Really like this game.
My only complaint is that at times the clue extends beyond the screen and cannot be seen.
Ok

It's a great game, except that there are so many 3-letter words that it makes it impossible to beat my previous scores. I suppose since they are smaller words, that's why it added 15+ of then to reach l each puzzle.
Alright gameplay
I could do without the incessant "do you smoke pot?" ad. Removing from my phone, because no, my 8 year old who uses it the most doesn't smoke and I am tired of looking over and seeing that.
Word Search

It's not too bad.I just wish they had more if them instead of having to do the same ones over and over again.It's not much of a challenge if you remember where the words are because you've done them all numerous times before:/
Ok game
This game would be better if the words would change and if there were topics to choose from. But its same words over and over that its getting boring. its not challenging at all..
NO TIMER OPTION PLEASE!!

I love this word search game but I get so anxious trying to do this quickly. I try to ignore the timer but I still know its there and after a few minutes I find myself racing again.  I no longer play this game at bedtime because it is not relaxing. Please install a option to delete the timer.
Used to be fun!
I would love to give a 5, this is an awesome game....however for the last two weeks its has been force closing and won't let me play. I won't rate any better till this is fixed.
Good game but room for improvement

Probably the best free chess game but uneven play at lower levels. Level 1 plays tougher than level 3. I can play this game almost even on some upper Levels and I am not that strong.  Still recommended overall.
You can play chess against the computer or another person. You can choose to ...

You can play chess against the computer or another person. You can choose to be black or white and can disable the white aide so it is easier or harder for yourself. All in all an excellent game. It really does deserve five stars.	I love this game. It has so many good settings. I have a bunch of games from this company. It is great.
Pretty good
Really good game but I think the difficulty setting is weird because number 1 is hard itself.. I managed to beat the cpu till 7 though
I really enjoy it! The level 7-10 are tough, but it's really nice for ...
I really enjoy it! The level 7-10 are tough, but it's really nice for practicing. One simple blunder will screw you up	Marvelous!
better than killing brain cells on TV
I spend hours in the evening playing this.instead of drooling in front of a TV, I can use my brain cells to plan strategy. I love chess.
Great fun!
I'm way too addicted to this game. Nice, fast gameplay. No bugs for me.
Clever game so far. I have not had to saw my own foot off ...
Clever game so far. I have not had to saw my own foot off yet !
Great game
I didn't understand it at first then I got the concept of it. I didn't really see anything tellibg you how to play the game.
Good
Very nice graphics, interesting puzzles. I would recommend it to those who want to kill some time.
Lots of fun
I love this game. I like trying to figure out how to open the door. The only thing I don't like is that you have to buy certain levels. I would love to play them all.

So I like this game so much that I told my wife to play and download it is well, we're both having fun laying in our beds trying to open the next door see who can get the farthest love the game and everyone else yet should too	Can't wait to open the next door, I'm an a competition with my wife and at this moment she is winning... Love the game
Can't stop playing

Its a good game for thinking. The only thing that I would change about this game is that when you past the levels and chapters, I would give more coins to the player. Besides that I have no complaints as of yet.

Improvments

I like the improvements since my last update, however, give us the option to recall the tiles on our own if the word is not good instead of the app doing it automatically. Mediocre, indeed!

This is not a free game but a demo. You can play 12 of the 72 levels and they're extremely simple and you don't get a taste for any kind of difficulty or Brain & Puzzle game play at all - If there even are such in the full version. The levels in the demo don't really allow for different options/strategies and there's nothing to play around with just for fun. The limited amount of water (instead of adding difficulty by requiring complicated puzzle solving) doesn't really help either. The graphics are cute and water splashes around pretty nicely. If you just need something to entertain little kids then it will do okay, otherwise there's nothing to see here.

OMG!

The best "game" I've ever played. I spent two hours on the first level. Best i could get was 22%   stressed (found one which was 100%, the absolute weakest bridge possible that isn't a "fail").  A great app for getting an intuitive grasp of bridge mechanics without needing the math (even if you know the math this is faster).
Interesting

This is a puzzle game. Being a mechanical engineer I have found this game insanely interesting! It will show you struts which have critical stress and when your bridge fails you can get an idea about why it failed. This is a good game if you are interested in puzzles or solving (engineering) problems.
